XI.iii.1.C.3.a
.
When Burial Benefits Are Not Payable by VBA
VBA does
not
pay burial benefits to other Federal agencies if the deceased Veteran or servicemember
died during active military service
was admitted to a hospital prior to separation from service, but died before being separated
was a member of Congress who died while holding office, or
was a Federal prisoner.
Exception
:Â  VBA may cover the cost of local interment and award a burial allowance to cover secondary expenses for Federal prisoners.
